title: Identifying unsafe or harmful workplace conditions
description: Identifying unsafe or harmful workplace conditions
content:
Scenario: Identifying unsafe or harmful workplace conditions
    Given restaurant work involves physical demands and potential hazards
    When I experience unsafe conditions or health risks
    Then the workplace_elohim should help me identify hazards
    And provide information about workplace safety rights
    And support me in reporting unsafe conditions
    And advocate for conditions that protect workers' health
